Description: *** SHIPPING & INSURANCE ( COSTS $130-180 USD ) IS INCLUDED IN THE BUY IT NOW PRICE FOR EASY CALCULATION *** Here is a very clean and super rare 2010’s Mosrite Japan Mos-caster Surf Guitar for sale! Made in Japan by Fillmore. Ash body w/ maple neck, candy apple red finish w/ white pearl pick guard, Mosrite Japan strat style single coils pick ups w/ vol-tone controls + 5 way pu selector switch, metal knobs & switch cap, Kluson style tuners, modern style tremolo, guitar weighs 3.75 kilos on my digital scale, original gig bag & tag included! This guitar is very clean w/ few faint scratches & dimples, tiny ding at the side edge of the body, minimal fret wear, Overall condition 8.8/10 *** I am not a vintage specialist, luthier or a guitar shop *** guitar is cleaned w/ new strings ready to play *** Please look at all the pics carefully for exact condition, details & originality *** I do not have any other info or history of this guitar, so please don't ask. Google for exact spec & additional info! *** *** I HAVE DESCRIBED THE DETAILS OF THIS VINTAGE USED GUITAR TO THE BEST OF MY KNOWLEDGE *** PLEASE ASK ALL QUESTIONS, LOOK AT ALL THE PICS, JUDGE and DECIDE FOR YOURSELF BEFORE PURCHASE *** SALE IS FINAL / NO CLAIMS or RETURNS / SOLD AS IS *** IMMEDIATE PAYMENT BY PAYPAL ONLY *** ALL RUDE MESSAGES WILL BE REPORTED TO EBAY IMMEDIATELY AND WILL AUTOMATICALLY BE ON MY BID BLOCK LIST PERMANENTLY *** *** I will ONLY ship to your VERIFIED/CONFIRMED paypal address *** I will pack this guitar very well in a heavy duty guitar box, and ship by EMS(express mail service) fully insured through Japan post to your Postal carrier *** Delivery time varies depending on your location and how fast the customs in your country will clear the item (usually 4-7 days to USA) *** Declared value will be the insurance value *** *** USA buyers have not been taxed so far *** *** ALL TAXES, CUSTOMS FEES, or IMPORT DUTIES ARE BUYERS RESPONSIBILITY *** THESE CHARGES WILL BE COLLECTED BY CUSTOMS IN YOUR COUNTRY BEFORE OR ON DELIVERY *** PLEASE CHECK WITH YOUR LOCAL TAX LAWS & REGULATIONS REGARDING THIS MATTER *** *** I will not be responsible for any damages occurred during transit as I do not have any control over the handling of the package *** If a claim does arise, I will assist you 100% with insurance claim! *** I will ship within 24-48 Hours after receiving payment in full *** I will send all EMS tracking information right after the item has been shipped *** Thanks for looking!!!
Title: 2010’s  MOSRITE JAPAN SURF GUITAR by FILLMORE STRAT PICK UPS & TREMOLO RARE!!!
